subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] OT: My list of Yahoo Groups
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
My recommendation: Stay away from Grouply!  ESPECIALLY if you're a group 
moderator or owner of one or more Yahoogroups.

Giving them your Yahoo login name and PASSWORD (required by Grouply) is 
essentially turning your Moderator privileges over to them.

Zack

On Thu, 13 Nov 2008, Laura Kimberley wrote:

> Hi,
>
> You can see a list of my groups on Grouply at the link below. Maybe you'll find
> some you want to join.
>
> Laura
>
> Here's the link:
> http://www.grouply.com/register.php?tmg=1763183&vt=20497142
>
